trans-unit.source: An error occurred
What's the matter?
How can I fix the issue?
Tell me more, please
To customize this notice, create a custom template file named %s.
trans-unit.target: 为了自定义通知, 创建一个名称为%s的自定义模板文件。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing this script. Something does not work properly.
trans-unit.target: 执行这个脚本时发生了一个错误。无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Open the system/logs/error.log file and find the associated error message (usually the last one). You can also add the following line to the local configuration file and reload this page:
trans-unit.target: 打开system/logs/error.log文件然后找到相关的错误信息(通常情况下会在最后一行)。你也可以在配置文件中添加一下信息并重新加载这个页面:

trans-unit.source: However, please be aware that anyone will be able to see error messages on your website then!
trans-unit.target: 无论如何，请小心任何人将会看到网站上的错误信息！

trans-unit.source: The script execution stopped, because something does not work properly. The actual error message is hidden by this notice for security reasons and can be found in in the system/logs/error.log file (see above). If you do not understand the error message or do not know how to fix the problem, search the Contao FAQs or visit the Contao support page.
trans-unit.target: 脚本执行已停止，由于不能正常工作。由于安全原因真实的错误信息被隐藏，可以在system/logs/error.log文件中查看(查看以上信息)。如果你不理解错误信息或不清楚如何修改问题，请搜索Contao FAQs或访问Contao支持页.

trans-unit.source: Invalid request token
The request token could not be verified.
Please click this link and try again. Do not use the back button of your browser.
trans-unit.target: 请点击这里重试一次。不要使用浏览器中的后退按钮。

trans-unit.source: This error occurs if there is a POST request without a valid authentication token. In Contao 2.10, the referer check has been replaced with a request token system. If the problem persists, you may be using an incompatible third-party extension or have not correctly updated your Contao installation.
trans-unit.target: 如果是一个不带有效认证码的POST请求，会发生这个错误。在Contao 2.10中，HTTP Referer检测已经替换为请求令牌系统。如果问题依然存在，你也许使用了不兼容的第三方扩展或不正确的更新了你的Contao系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search the Contao FAQs or visit the Contao support page.
trans-unit.target: 更多信息, 请搜索Contao FAQs或访问Contao支持页。

trans-unit.source: Incomplete installation
The installation has not been completed, therefore Contao cannot work properly.
trans-unit.target: 安装没有完成，所以Contao不能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Point your browser to the following URL:
path-to-installation
This will open the Contao install tool, which will guide you through the installation process.
trans-unit.target: 打开Contao安装工具，用来引导安装流程。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please refer to the Contao manual.
Page not found
The page you have requested does not exist under this domain.
Try to go to the top level and use the search function (if any) to find the page you were looking for. You may also contact the webmaster and let him know that there is something wrong.
Forward page not found
The application has been configured to forward the request to another page, however, the target page does not exist or has not been published.

This is something that needs to be fixed by the administrator of the website. If you are a visitor, there is nothing you can do except to contact the webmaster to let him know that there is something wrong.
No root page found
There is no website root page which matches the requested language and/or domain name.
If you have explicitly set a language, try to go to the top level and see whether you are being redirected. Otherwise contact the webmaster and let him know that there is something wrong.
No layout specified
The page you have requested has not yet been associated with a page layout.
Make sure that you have assigned a page layout to each website root page in the site structure.
For more information, please refer to the Contao manual.
No active pages found
Your request has been mapped to a website which does not yet contain any published pages.
Most likely, the website is still under development and will be online in a few days. If you still think that there is something wrong, contact the webmaster and let him know.
Forbidden
You are either not authenticated or you are not allowed to access the requested page.

If you are not logged in, try to go to the top level and look for a login form. If there is no login form or if you are logged in already, contact the webmaster and let him know that there is something wrong.
